=== Scout Editors
:doctype: article
:revnumber: {project-version}
include::_initDoc.adoc[]

ifndef::mdledir[:mdledir: ../../../../adoc]
:experimental:

The Scout SDK provides following Editors:

* Some extensions to the existing <<sdk_editor_java.adoc#, Java Editor>>.
* A <<sdk_editor_nls.adoc#, NLS Editor>> to edit the different localization Texts properties files.
